content: with this pattern you ve found a great first garment project stitched in caron colorama halo o go this crochet shawl is a stylish canvas for showcasing the color transitions of this gorgeous yarn worked in 2 panels that are seamed together in finishing a field of single_crochet stitches is sandwiched between minimal ribbing that s created by working in the back loops only this large and cozy fabric provides both comfort and style to any outfit yarn for model caron® colorama™ halo o go™ 8 oz/227 g 481 yds/440 m orchid frost 28001 4 o gos or 1924 yds/1760 m
